original_title: Spooked: The Ghosts of Waverly Hills Sanatorium
overview: Follows Hollywood filmmakers, The Booth Brothers as they uncover the shocking truth within the haunted halls of The Scariest Place On Earth, Waverly Hills Sanatorium, a monster of a building where it is said over 63,000 people died.
title: Spooked: The Ghosts of Waverly Hills Sanatorium
